title: Chief Know-It-All feat. Chris Sullivan
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Actor and musician Chris Sullivan (This Is Us, Joseph The Spouse) plays the boastful, blowhard title character in this Hawaiian tale about an egotistical chief who gets cut down to size.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Chief Know-It-All feat. Chris Sullivan
itunes:summary: Actor and musician Chris Sullivan (This Is Us, Joseph The Spouse) plays the boastful, blowhard title character in this Hawaiian tale about an egotistical chief who gets cut down to size.
